profileAlternative.name: Yanki Shah
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer 2 at eBay
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a recent graduate from San Jose State University and actively looking for full time opportunity in Software/Web Development, Full Stack Development and Big Data/Machine Learning Application Development. In addition to excelling academically, I have 2 years of overall industrial experience in Software/Web development and Full stack (Front End & Back End) development.

• Github: github.com/yankishah
• Worked as Software Developer, Web/Full Stack Developer and a Machine Learning enthusiast
• Good knowledge in Agile methodologies and project management
• Build Tools: Travis CI, Grunt, Bower
• Languages: JAVA, Javascript, Python, R, C++
• Cloud : Amazon AWS, IBM Bluemix, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud
• QA Tools: Selenium (IDE, WebDriver), Appium, JMeter, testthat(R), JUnit, Mocha.Js
• Web Technologies: AngularJS, NodeJS-Express, jQuery, AJAX, Rest Web-service, SOAP, Wordpress
• UI: Angular-Material, CSS3, HTML5, Bootstrap
• Databases/Middleware: MySQL, Oracle 10g/11g, MongoDB, Redis, MS SQL Server 2008 & 2012
• OS: Linux - Ubuntu, Windows
• Newbie Learner/developer in Deep/Machine Learning Application Development, Data Engineering


Areas of interests:
• Scalable and highly available distributed system development
• Enterprise software development
• Full Stack application development and Node.Js development
• Data Engineering and Back-end development

• Designed, developed and integrated CRM & messaging applications in Java and .Net which boosted overall revenue for Q3-Q4 by 37%....
